front.title: Comparison between Segment Routing and LDP/RSVP-TE

abstract.t: Segment Routing has been proposed to cope with the use cases in traffic engineering, fast re-reroute, service chain, etc. This document is to compare Segment Routing with the existing LDP and RSVP-TE. Through the comparison the challenges are clarified for the Segment Routing when deploy in the existing MPLS network.
